I am new to JUnit.  can you/anybody send me some details about/examples
about how to use JUnit, Please,
mohanJAVA@...
  -----Original Message-----
  From: Sandhya Sree [mailto:sandhya.sree@...]
  Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2001 6:41 PM
  To: junit@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: [junit] Reply soon



  Hi,
          Iam familiar in writing testcases for bussiness objects using
JUnit and now iam trying to write the testcase for the servlets for which
iam making use of Cactus.I have set the path for commons-cactus.jar.I have
used import statements like...
  import org.apache.commons.cactus.*;
  import org.apache.commons.cactus.util.*;
  Iam able to compile the java files while run time it is throwing the
following exception

  java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError: java.util.MissingResourceException:
Can't find resource for base name cactus, locale en_US
          at java.util.ResourceBundle.getBundle(ResourceBundle.java:423)
          at java.util.ResourceBundle.getBundle(ResourceBundle.java:339)
          at
org.apache.commons.cactus.client.AbstractHttpClient.<clinit>(AbstractHttpCli
ent.java:82)
          at java.lang.FloatingDecimal.<clinit>(FloatingDecimal.java:1662)
          at
org.apache.commons.cactus.AbstractTestCase.runBare(AbstractTestCase.java:266
)

  I will be very grateful to you if you send me the solution asap

  regards,
  Sandhya Sree

        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor



  To unsubscribe from this group, send an email to:
  junit-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com


  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
